message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $115. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I understand that you're willing to come down to $115, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $110?
